amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in House Report 105-214, and offered as a substitute to the Istook amendment to require health centers that receive federal family planning funds to encourage family involvement and to counsel minors on methods to resist coercive sexual activities.

action.text: Substitute (A016) offered by Mr. Castle to the Istook amendment (A015).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 201 (Roll no. 378).
